channel.title: Fromage and ML
channel.description: A summary of personnal courses/projects providing cheat sheet to help people using ML in general.

item.title: Network for Mouse Genetics
item.description: Wikipedia describes the phenotype as the composite of the organism’s observable characteristics or traits. (…) An organism’s phenotype results from two basic factors: the expression of an organism’s genetic code, or its genotype, and the influence of environmental factors. Both factors may interact, further affecting phenotype. In fact, both the...

item.title: Visual Morse Code Decoder
item.description:
Coming Soon
The project aims at developing a program/application which would read and translate morse codes like in the following image into plain words in real time, using CNN analyzing the image flow and keeping tracks of the stacked information.

item.title: C++ Multithreaded Coencapsulation
item.description: Introduction The goal of the project consisted in coencapsulating micro-beads of RNA primers with cells into a single drop of lysis buffer in order to allow sub-sequent RNA single cell sequencing.: this would allow to let the RNA of the cell binds to the bead, which could be further down...

item.title: Data Awareness Dunnhumby dataset
item.description: Full data story We proposed an in-depth analysis of the dunnhumby dataset: a file gathering information about consumer behaviors and demographic information for the dunnhumby company (an american supermarket chain) Since more than 90% of our data consisted of food items, we were naturally interested in scrapping the nutritional values...
